casebody.data:
State
v.
Jamison Christopher Goins 273A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 22, 2016 Shawn Robert Evans, Attorney at Law, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Andrew Nelson, for Goins, Jamison Christopher.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of July 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of July 2016."
